=================================
Pronouns ti/ta/tu as subject/object
=================================

ti cu klama ta
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (ti)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))) (sumti (ta))))

ta cu klama tu
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (ta)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))) (sumti (tu)))))

tu cu klama ti
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (tu)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))) (sumti (ti))))
